msg.msgText:
A "MessagingPolicy" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update MessagingPolicy help imaserver update MessagingPolicy "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update MessagingPolicy "Name=MsgPol1" "Destination=Topic2"
Configuration items for "MessagingPolicy" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
